title: Summer Swing
description: See alternate cover edition here.When Ellie meets Gage, she feels like she's truly found a meaningful relationship. Between Gage's summer baseball games, her job with a popular radio station, and the excitement of new romance, Ellie's life feels full. When Gage's new teammate moves to town, his first meeting with Ellie immediately sets her on edge. He's intense yet quiet--a scary combination. Tyse is far from the social butterfly, and he keeps his background where it belongs--in the past. But despite everyone's disapproval, Ellie wants to befriend Tyse. Their friendship eventually produces a series of cause-and-effect that wreaks havoc on Ellie's relationship with Gage, and also her relationship with her family. Add a good-looking British doctor and a combative sister and Ellie has more on her plate than she can handle. She knows she can't please everyone, but she must prioritize the men in her life before it's too late...
author: Delia Delaney
